value:
I haven't been on a picnic in a while,
so I'm a little uneasy... Did we forget
anything?

I never had time to do anything like
this before I got here... No question
about it.

You may not be surprised to hear
that I've never really cooked before...$k$pI can roast wild game on a spit.
It's my campfire specialty. Shall
we try that?

Let's go on a boat ride in the lake.
I'll row—I'm used to it.

I brought a book, and perhaps it's
the scenery, but I'm finding that it's
resonating rather strongly with me.

The weather's beautiful, isn't it?
I'm here to invite you to a picnic
with $Nf.

I'm in uncharacteristically high
spirits. Is it the weather, I wonder?

Even in the midst of all this hubbub,
one must remain centered.

Having too much fun can pose
a problem...

Where shall we head to next?
Wherever you go, I'll stay by
your side.

Whoa... I've arrived at an unexpected
place, haven't I? My name is Lukas.
Let's have a good time today.

I must thank you for that meal. You're
quite a cook, aren't you? It was truly
delicious.$k$pWhen I was first summoned here, I
found this place rather puzzling. It
was a relief to find I liked the food.$k$pA soldier is useless on an empty
stomach, after all.$k$pI'm grateful that we can share a
delicious meal together under a
beautiful blue sky.$k$pLet's do this again sometime. I find
that anything is enjoyable as long as
I'm with you.
たあっ！
いきます！
ぐあっ…！
しまった…！
My oh my...
This can't stand.
What disrespect!
Lunch is served.
Enjoy...the weather...
Hahh...
You work hard each and every day. Even someone with a work ethic as tremendous as yours deserves a break now and then.
Oh! Please don't sneak up when my back is turned. I would never dream of doing such a thing to you.
I feel bad leaving all the cooking to you and the others. While it pains me to admit this, I'm not the most...domestic person.
These sweets are delightful! Did you bring them?
I never have the time to simply read a book under the shade of a tree. I should seize this opportunity.
It's been some time since I've felt so at peace. Maybe it's your calming presence that puts me at ease.
Please allow me to refill your drink. It's the least I can do.
Let's go for a stroll.
Perfect picnic weather.
Care to try this dish?
